blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary:
Stain : I deeply regret what I did in Hosu. I really messed up.
All Might : [gasp] You're finally showing remorse?
Stain : What?...
body:
Stain : I deeply regret what I did in Hosu. I really messed up.
All Might : [gasp] You're finally showing remorse?
Stain : What? No, I mean... I got caught by ENDEAVOR. Of ALL people, the one to arrest me is f*****g Endeavor! I'm mortified, you know?

dialogue.name: Stain
dialogue.label: Stain :
dialogue.phrase: I deeply regret what I did in Hosu. I really messed up.

blog.name: hoples
blog.title: Hoples
blog.description: Simple person with many interests and who is sorry for any depresing things here

summary: “I have last 3 bullets.”   -- holy hell am I proud of this piece, so whats happening here? Hizashi is part of large scale...
caption:
“I have last 3 bullets.”

–

holy hell am I proud of this piece, so whats happening here?
Hizashi is part of large scale mission, ends up caved in with some nasty shits and member of his team.
Why is his hair all floaty? I have this headcanon that his hair mimic sound waves he produces, here he is humming to ease his throat, so that is why his hair floats around.
This is illustration for story I’m planning to write.

blog.name: toshienn
blog.title: HONESTY BITCH
blog.description: he/him.

summary: Dude what the hell, I'm reading TV tropes and whoever wrote this thing won't stop talking about how Enji is not that ~bad~...
body:
Dude what the hell, I’m reading TV tropes and whoever wrote this thing won’t stop talking about how Enji is not that ~bad~ because it’s been revealed he married rei to “balance out his weakness” which apparently is deemed as meaningful?? But like, that legit means he was still using her to balance out the weakness of his quirk in their descendent… There’s literally no other way in how she could balance out his weakness “in a meaningful, deep way”.

Unless I’m missing something???? I just literally cannot understand what’s so romantic or uwu about marrying someone so they balance out your weakness with your quirk because that’s still using them.

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: Katsuki Bakugou and the f*cking Yule Ball
title: Katsuki Bakugou and the f*cking Yule Ball
description:
by The_Crafty_Cracker

He was Katsuki Bakugou—the Katsuki Bakugou. He was the top wizard in his year and the chosen champion for Hogwarts to compete in the famous Tri-Wizard tournament. All he had to do was get a date for this stupid fucking dance, which, as a champion apparently, he had to attend. So with all that in mind, he should not be having this fucking problem.

“The Yule Ball. Me. And you.” He growled, glaring at the nerd who looked up at him wide-eyed for a few seconds while blushing heavily.

“Kacchan, I’m flattered…” Deku trailed off, not daring to look at him while fiddling nervously with the edges of his green lined robes. “But-”

“But? Why the fuck is there a but?” He raged, there was no way in Azkaban, that Deku of all people was going to reject him.

“Because he’s coming with me.” Another familiar voice butted in and Katsuki scowled as he turned, knowing exactly who it was without even having to look at the fucker. Shoto fucking Todoroki.

Words: 5260, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia

blog.name: bnha-fluff-week
blog.title: BNHA-Fluff-Week
blog.description: Here to heal your heart after BNHA Angst Week! Set for 17-23th of June! Icon and header by @teenytraveler.

summary: What happens if you get a ship you absolutely don't like at all and are strongly against for whatever reason?
question: What happens if you get a ship you absolutely don't like at all and are strongly against for whatever reason?
answer:
I just edited the main post to cover this but to answer your question, this is not just about ships. 

It is completely up to you to decide to make it a ship thing or a platonic thing so if you get a pair you don’t ship then that’s fine! You can write them as friends or anything as long as it is fluffy (which I stress again does not mean romantic)

I hope that’s okay! :)
